front.title: Facsimile Applications for Internet Fax Full Mode

abstract.t: This memo explains Internet Fax Full Mode facsimile applications which can be implemented using the method of capability exchange in Internet Fax Full Mode. These applications are the same as implemented in G3FAX using T.30 protocol. These applications will be implemented under the Internet Draft 'Extended MDN for Internet Fax Full Mode' or other capability exchange mechanism.
